name: sessionizer
title: Sessionizer
description: Quick access to existing project directories in your preferred editor.
author: carlos_ballena

commands.name: code
commands.title: Start Code Session
commands.description: Open one of your projects in your preferred code editor.

preferences.name: projectsDirectoryLevels
preferences.title: Projects Directory Levels
preferences.description: Number of levels in your projects directory structure. Useful if you group your projects in folders.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
